item1_summary:
Alexandria Real Estate Equities, Inc. (NYSE: ARE) is a best-in-class, mission-driven life science REIT making a positive and lasting impact on the world . Alexandria is the preeminent and longest-tenured owner, operator, and developer of collaborative Megacampus™ ecosystems in AAA life science innovation cluster locations . Alexandria has a total market capitalization of  $29.0 billion and asset base in North America that includes 39.8 million RSF of operating properties .
 Alexandria also provides strategic capital to transformative life science companies through our venture capital platform . Alexandria provides a unique business model and diligent underwriting ensure a high-quality and diverse tenant base that results in higher occupancy levels, longer lease terms, higher rental income, higher returns, and greater long-term asset value . The occupancy percentage of our operating properties in North America was  94.6%
